name: PENNSY SUPPLY, INC., Appellant v. McDERMITT CONCRETE, INC., a/k/a Caco Three, Inc. and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Environmental Protection, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Pennsy Supply, Inc. v. McDermitt Concrete, Inc.

parties: PENNSY SUPPLY, INC., Appellant v. McDERMITT CONCRETE, INC., a/k/a Caco Three, Inc. and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Environmental Protection, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of August, 2009, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED, and Appellant’s Application for Oral Argument is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
979 A.2d 838
PENNSY SUPPLY, INC., Appellant v. McDERMITT CONCRETE, INC., a/k/a Caco Three, Inc. and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Environmental Protection, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 17, 2009.
